name: Personal Assistant Army
description: A multi-agent AI platform for creating specialized AI assistants with custom tools, memory, and inter-agent communication

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection string (automatically set by Heroku Postgres addon)

POSTGRES_SCHEMA.description: PostgreSQL schema name (leave blank for 'public', or specify custom schema)

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth Client ID from Google Cloud Console

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google OAuth Client Secret from Google Cloud Console

ENCRYPTION_SECRET.description: Random 32-byte hex string for encrypting API keys. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

SESSION_SECRET.description: Random string for session signing. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
